content.description:
Straight forward warmup OR cool down at the end of the day. Great way to work endurance. 

  No strict definition for this route: just traverse back and forth.
content.location: Start at one extreme end of the area and traverse to the other.

content.description:
Next area over from the Rock One Area. Some short top ropes and home to the awesome warmup or cooldown traverse (bouldering) called Toxic Traverse. 

  The main trail has a trail branching off (to the right if walking from the parking lot towards Jims, etc) about 10-15 seconds walk from the upper parking lot) that brings you right to the South end of this area. 

  If you take this offshoot trail youll arrive (in seconds) at a fork, left (at the fork once on it) youre at the start of Indian Rocks, if you follow it right (at fork) youll go to the Rock One Area.
